meanings.sent1: She carefully unwrinkles the paper before wrapping the gift.
meanings.sent2: Using an iron, she unwrinkles the shirt to make it look neat.
meanings.sent3: He unwrinkles his forehead in surprise when he sees the magic trick.
meanings.sent4: Her smile unwrinkles his troubled thoughts like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze unwrinkles the surface of the lake, creating a mirror-like reflection.

meanings.definition: Makes something smooth and free of wrinkles
meanings.sent1: The tailor skillfully unwrinkles the fabric before sewing it into a dress.
meanings.sent2: After a good steam, the steamer unwrinkles the curtains beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The robot butler unwrinkles the tablecloth with a quick flick of its robotic arm.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter unwrinkles the tense atmosphere in the room, making everyone relax.
meanings.sent5: The warm sunlight gently unwrinkles the petals of the flower, revealing its vibrant colors.
